import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{FaRegStar,FaStar}from"react-icons/fa";import"./css/MovieDetail.css";import LoginContext from'../login/LoginContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MovieDetail=()=>{const{movieNo}=useParams();const[moviedata,setMovieData]=useState(null);const[soname,setSoname]=useState("");// 리뷰 작성자 이름
const[review,setReview]=useState("");// 리뷰 내용
const[reviews,setReviews]=useState([]);// 리뷰 목록
const[rating,setRating]=useState(0);// 별점
const{loginMember}=useContext(LoginContext);// 로그인된 사용자 정보
const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{axios.get(`http://localhost:666/api/movie/selectMovie?movieNo=${movieNo}`).then(response=>{setMovieData(response.data[0]);}).catch(e=>alert("불러오기 실패"));},[movieNo]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get(`http://localhost:666/api/comment/movie/${movieNo}`).then(response=>{setReviews(response.data);}).catch(e=>alert("코멘트 불러오기 실패"));},[movieNo]);// 리뷰 제출 처리
const handleReviewSubmit=()=>{if(!loginMember){// 로그인 확인
const shouldNavigate=window.confirm("로그인이 필요합니다. 로그인 페이지로 이동하시겠습니까?");if(shouldNavigate){navigate('/memberLogin');return;}else{return;}}const newReview={soname:loginMember.memberName||soname,// 로그인된 사용자의 이름 사용
text:review,rating:rating,memberNo:loginMember.memberNo};axios.post(`http://localhost:666/api/comment/insert`,{movieNo:movieNo,text:newReview.text,score:newReview.rating,soname:newReview.soname,memberNo:newReview.memberNo}).then(response=>{setReviews([...reviews,newReview]);setReview("");setRating(0);setSoname("");// 폼 초기화
}).catch(e=>alert("관람평 제출 실패"));};// 리뷰 삭제 처리
const handleDeleteReview=coid=>{axios.delete(`http://localhost:666/api/comment/delete`,{params:{coid:coid}}).then(response=>{setReviews(reviews.filter(review=>review.coid!==coid));}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error deleting review:",error);});};// 별점 클릭 처리
const handleRatingClick=value=>{setRating(value);};useEffect(()=>{if(loginMember){setSoname(loginMember.memberName);// 로그인된 사용자의 이름으로 설정
}},[loginMember]);if(!moviedata){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"image",src:`.${moviedata.movieImage}`,alt:moviedata.movieTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie-infomation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title",children:moviedata.movieTitle}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grade",children:["\uAD00\uB78C \uB4F1\uAE09: ",moviedata.movieGrade]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"showtime",children:["\uC0C1\uC601 \uC2DC\uAC04: ",moviedata.movieShowtime]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"story",children:["\uC2A4\uD1A0\uB9AC: ",moviedata.movieStory]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"booking-button",children:"\uC608\uB9E4\uD558\uAE30"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"review-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"star-rating",children:[1,2,3,4,5].map(value=>value<=rating?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaStar,{size:30,className:"star selected",onClick:()=>handleRatingClick(value)},value):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaRegStar,{size:30,className:"star",onClick:()=>handleRatingClick(value)},value))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"review-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:soname,onChange:e=>setSoname(e.target.value),placeholder:"\uC774\uB984\uC744 \uC785\uB825\uD558\uC138\uC694",className:"soname-input",disabled:!!loginMember// 로그인된 경우에는 입력 불가능하게 설정
}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:review,onChange:e=>setReview(e.target.value),placeholder:"\uAD00\uB78C\uD3C9\uC744 \uC785\uB825\uD558\uC138\uC694",className:"review-textarea"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"review-submit-button",onClick:handleReviewSubmit,children:"\uB4F1\uB85D\uD558\uAE30"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"reviews-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uAD00\uB78C\uD3C9"}),reviews.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"\uC544\uC9C1 \uC791\uC131\uB41C \uAD00\uB78C\uD3C9\uC774 \uC5C6\uC2B5\uB2C8\uB2E4."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:reviews.map((rev,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"review-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[rev.soname,":"]})," ",rev.text," (",rev.score,"\uC810)",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-button",onClick:()=>handleDeleteReview(rev.coid),children:"\uC0AD\uC81C"})]},index))})]})]});};export default MovieDetail;
